page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Approximately one quarter of the population are retired people. A small number of people are unemployed although this number reduces when farmers are busier or when bulders have more work. A high proportion of people are manual workers or have a skilled trade. Manual workers are mostly employed on farms. Amongst those with a skilled trade are mechanics or those employed by builders. The area has a great many small building firms and a larger company called Necton Management Services. There are also professsional workers which includes a large number who belong to the Royal Air Force and are employed at {RAF MARHAM}15 miles from Necton.Other professions include teachers,bank workers, solicitors and office workers.
